faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a range of services including AI consulting, custom software development, and cloud solutions. Our team specializes in creating innovative solutions tailored to your business needs.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team at support@example.com or call us at +1-555-123-4567 during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM EST).

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our business hours are Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST. We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

faqs.question: Do you offer free consultations?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a free 30-minute consultation to discuss your project requirements and how we can help you achieve your goals.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payment terms can be discussed during the project planning phase.
